# Changelog

All notable changes to MDSmart will be documented in this file.

## [0.1.0] - 2024-01-20

### Added
- Initial release of MDSmart
- Core functionality for natural language to SQL conversion
- Support for SQLite, PostgreSQL, and MySQL databases
- Multi-database connection and intelligent routing
- Knowledge base for business logic and documentation
- Automatic SQL error fixing
- ChromaDB integration for vector storage
